name: Good Girl Blush Elixir Eau de Parfum Gift Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:This limited-edition Carolina Herrera gift set features Good Girl Blush Elixir, a floral women's perfume with notes of ravishing rose, vanilla, and smoky patchouli. It is presented in a dazzling-red, snowflake-print gift box and topped with ribbon, making it the perfect holiday gift..This Set Contains:- 2.7 oz/ 80 mL Good Girl Blush Elixir Eau de Parfum
ingredients: Good Girl Blush Elixir Eau de Parfum Elixir:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Citral, Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 17200 (Red 33), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5)...Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citral, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2)...Good Girl Blush Body Lotion:.Aqua (Water), Cocoglycerides, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Gluconate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Tocopherol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citral, Coumarin.
